product_name: WTB Speed V Comp Saddle - Men's
long_description: This high-comfort performance saddle offers perineal-area and soft tissue relief while remaining flexible for comfort. Channel reduces pressure on the perineal area without detracting from the support, comfort or look of the saddle. Features an abbreviated nose, a 6mm center drop and a slightly wider rear and mid-section for additional support. Rounded profile allows easy transitions. Made with durable synthetic leather cover and steel rails.
short_description: This high-comfort performance saddle offers perineal-area and soft tissue relief while remaining flexible for comfort.
